website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this petite model inexpensive, Ivation’s Medium Thermo is the perfect choice for dehumidifying stagnant bathrooms, cars, and other small areas prone to developing mold.
pros: Collects about 16 fluid ounces per day
cons: This model’s smaller reservoir only holds 1.5 liters

customer_reviews.title: Good Dehumidifier for the Cost and for "Average" Sized Rooms
customer_reviews.text: The dehumidifier's instructions are very clear/detailed. Once I removed the dehumidifier from the box, I had it set up and working in less than five minutes. As the dehumidifier collects water, the water level is easy to see without turning off the machine and/or removing the reservoir. Emptying the water is very easy so using the humidifier is very simple. I have used the dehumidifier in rooms approximately 10' x 12' and collected about 20-25 ounces of water in a 8-10 hour time frame. (There were condensation problems in my house...)
customer_reviews.author: BFCenTX

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought he smaller version for my suite at work and it worked so well I bought this for the office hall and waiting room. This collects water!!!!! Yes it really works if you have a moisture problem. The area smells clean and now we get compliments on our office spaces for how great it smells. Highly recommend...it works!!! Well worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: julie catalano

customer_reviews.title: I put this in a small bedroom (11X11) that is ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a small bedroom (11X11) that is damp. It is over crawl space and gets very little direct sun light so it has a tendency to stay damp and the floor sticky. It often gets a musky odor. I closed the doorI ran this over night and very little water was collected. I could tell a small difference in the room . It could be that it is too small or the room is not a damp as I think it is. When the spring rains come I will be able to tell more about its efficiency. I might change my review at that point. Right now I would say it is just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Va Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great in 22 foot travel trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the AcuRite 00613 Indoor Humidity Monitor in my 22-foot travel trailer year-round whenever I have it stored between camping trips. I first started using it near the end of a very rainy and humid winter in the Pacific Northwest. Before plugging it in, the relative humidity was 72% at about 45 degrees F. After about 4 hours of it running, the RH was 51%. As the weather has gotten warmer, the RH has gone down and usually ranges between 30% and 55%. I empty it about once every 7 to 10 days. It works great and the trailer no longer smells musty. I couldn't be happier with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We live in an old home. Moisture is a problem. I ordered three room-size Gurin dehumidifiers. Reasonably priced, those. They all three died after 2 years. Ordered this ONE machine. It will 'treat', draw the moisture out of those THREE rooms. Hope to get at least 5 years' of service. We'll see. The product is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Parker

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on smallish rooms
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and efficient. Does a great job on smallish rooms. It only took a couple of days to dry out a 10' x 10' bedroom. I am thinking of purchasing a few more for another bedroom, the bathroom, and the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Nixon

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I had been having mildew problems on my boat for years. I ran the humidifier on my AC unit but to no avail and a big waste of electricity. But,this little thing dried out my blankets, drapes and even the cabin walls in just two days! Now,I just leave it on all the time. I wish I would have thought of this years ago. Now,all I have to do is empty the little bucket every 3 to 4 days and the bucket is always full of water! and if I forget,the unit just turns itself off. It's quiet, takes up very little space and I don't even know it's there. I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: samo

customer_reviews.title: Really works, took us from 80% humidity to 60%
customer_reviews.text: You will be amazed how much humidity this can remove in a couple days. Here at the Jersey shore the AC just can't keep up with the humidity, but this made a huge difference, taking us from 80% in the house to about 60% after a week of use. The front vents will get a little grungy over time just like a ceiling fan, but considering the amount of air it moves, it's easy enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Medic NJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: We had a smaller, different brand of these in our bathroom so when it stopped working we decided on this larger one. It takes A LOT of water out of the air and works great.
customer_reviews.author: teacher06

customer_reviews.title: HATE HEAT! HATE HUMIDITY
customer_reviews.text: HATE HEAT! HATE HUMIDITY! Bought 2 of these because I have a small, compact 2 story house + basement. One is on the main floor & one upstairs. Together they work perfectly! I empty a very easy container every morning and each evening @ 9pm. The air ( along with my air conditioner) is clean, refreshing, and has alleviated my asthmatic symptoms. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Berry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect size for a 3x3x11' 7" space, assuming your looking to keep an area that size from 75% humidity to 47% humidity, I am keeping them both thank you
customer_reviews.author: Touretteboy

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Air
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I put this in my small laundry closet to reduce the mildew smell from a prior flood. It works exceptionally well for the size. The drainage is the only odd thing about it. Imagine dollar store water gun that's how you drain it, I am not complaining just pointing it out. This things works for small small spaces would suggest a larger one if you are putting it anywhere other than a small bedroom or closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: The REAL test will be in Cozumel Mexico, but works fine in Florida
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take to Cozumel Mexico where the humidity in the hotel rooms is very high. I tried it out in my bedroom in Florida and it collected a couple ounces of water in 24 hours, but the real test will be in August south of the border on a limestone piece of rock surrounded by water, Isla Cozumel. Instructions say nothing about placement of the unit. Noise level is tolerable. Seems to be well-built.
customer_reviews.author: shawnmcd

customer_reviews.title: Good small dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a replacement dehumidifier for my basement. Had a similar unit before this. This does a good job getting the moisture out of the air. If your are looking for a smaller size unit then this is a good choice. It’s quiet and small so good for bedroom if you needed it. The only down side is that the collection bin is small so you might need to empty it every other day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Nitemare90

customer_reviews.title: Works in small rooms
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Ivation dehumidifier each one a different size including the largest one for my basement. They all work well. This one is good for a small room it pulls enough moisture so that you can water accumulate in the container each day. It does not heat up the room to do this and is quiet. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent little unit.
customer_reviews.text: Use this unit on a small boat to keep it getting too stanky and humid. Seems to do the job but obviously not huge output (but as advertised) Would be nice if there would be a way to continually drain the basin rather than needing to dump it every few days. (I suppose I could drill a little hole in the basin with a hose leading outside but unsure!) This is about medium size - around shoe box - makes almost no noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my child's bedroom to help with the humidity ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful Mid-Size dehumidifier. Works great in my child's bedroom to help with the humidity in her room which was causing mold to grow everywhere. I wish this product came in a bigger size! It does exactly what it says it will do and it's affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Melba McNeil

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH
customer_reviews.text: its such a solid and needed piece of equipment. I live upstairs in the bedroom that was an expansion on the already big house with one A/C unit. So adding this in my room and it collects so far a quarter bucket every day pretty cool I would recommend fans in the room also to help air flow just saying overall tho it fantastic would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Great for small-midsize rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my kids room and it is working fine, every time they went to bed they started sneezing and coughing, after a few days with this product, the allergies are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a couple of weeks to accurately evaluate the dehumidifier. At first I wasn't sure it was doing anything of value but as I became more familiar with it I could see a difference in the humidity levels. It is so quiet one hardly notices it is running. Easy to empty excess water. Appearance wise to blends in with its surroundings without being obtrusive. All in all I am very satisfied with this purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It pulls a lot of moisture from the air!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sister. She had a lot of humidity in her condo and it didn't smell fresh to her. I haven't seen it in action, but she says it collects a lot of water. she empties it every other day. She said her apartment smells a lot fresher now. I plan to order one for my condo when I return to Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Adler

customer_reviews.title: buy this dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend this item. It's an efficient and large and pretty quiet dehumidifier, and lacks the annoying big transformer gizmo on the power cord. In a perfect world I'd want a longer power cord but you can buy an extension cord at the dollar store. No biggie. Improvement over my last unit and would buy again. Also, I felt the price was fair esp compared to similar. SHIPPED FAST and the last one broke down so this was welcome
customer_reviews.author: lizzie2k

customer_reviews.title: ,much improved
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of this item we have purchased for our large motorhome. One for the front and the new one for the rear. Like any dehumidifier you have to keep them emptied. We live off the coast of Washington and it is very damp here during the winter so this is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ortquist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and super quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pop-up camper and couldn't be happier with my purchase. It is compact and super quiet. The week we went camping was not very humid and a little chilly (not normal for August) but I still collected quite a bit of water. We were very comfortable and no dampness. Can't wait to see what happens when its humid out.
customer_reviews.author: klynn242

customer_reviews.title: It is drawing out water from the air and that is like some kind of magic
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a dehumidifier before so I didn't know what to expect, I am using it in about 450 sq feet. It is drawing out water from the air and that is like some kind of magic!!! I want my basement to stay dry and not like a basement. The real proof I guess will be in the winter!!! So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice low cost solution to the moisture issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camper just to keep it dry off season. We keep it on the kitchen counter next to the sink and it works very well. Nice low cost solution to the moisture issues.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Henderson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, runs quiet, ideal for small space
customer_reviews.text: This works OK for our bedroom. It's pretty quiet, so I can leave it running all night without it bothering me. It doesn't pull that much moisture from the air. I feel like I'd have to leave it running for long periods of time to remove any substantial amount of moisture. But if you have a small bedroom or other space, this would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anglea

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Larger Unit will Last Longer
customer_reviews.text: Had smaller unit by same manuf. Worked great for 2 years then died. Bought next sized up unit. Working great now. Hope this one lasts longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Not for very humid climates
customer_reviews.text: It would be a great product for a small space with limited humidity. I live with a lot of humidity and need something stronger. But it is very quiet which is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and quiet. Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a small room. Collects moisture just fine. Air movement through the unit is just a trickle...much less than I thought it would be. In this room on a tropical island, it takes 4 days to fill up the tank. I guess it helps, honestly cant tell other than the proof of water collection from the air.
customer_reviews.author: Tangie Purvis

customer_reviews.title: small. not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny. Not what i expected. Has no settings just on and off switch. I was expecting a legit humidifier with refrigerant. It barely collects any water
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: like a white noise sound machine in the background
customer_reviews.text: I am using this little dehumidifier in my bedroom and it runs quietly, like a white noise sound machine in the background. It filled up after four days so I think it is doing its job quite well considering the weather here where I live has been very humid with rain every day.
customer_reviews.author: L. France

customer_reviews.title: Does this thing work?
customer_reviews.text: Unit has been on in an average sized bedroom for 2 weeks; main door open and closed - NOT a DROP OF WATER! Expect to watch it this weekend - to be over 90 degrees outside. I was hoping it would put less stress on AC. $70 ???
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: these things are a joke. They don't even bring down humidity in very small space.
customer_reviews.author: Ryne

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: MY RV tends to get a musty smell to it and I have tried everything to get rid of it. The first day I put the dehumidifier in, it collect over half of the reservoir in water. It smells much better too. Ordered a second one for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: This product collects water like nothing this small size should
customer_reviews.text: This product collects water like nothing this small size should. Our lower level already smells better after only three days. I can't attest to the life expectancy of the product, but I can say that it really works.
customer_reviews.author: rhb

customer_reviews.title: very quiet
customer_reviews.text: this is a great little machine - it's very quiet and does a great job. The upstairs of our apartment is very hot and humid and especially in my sons room, and this helps remove that humidity and make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cook

customer_reviews.title: love it! Draws up an enormous amt
customer_reviews.text: Using this in the kitchen/living room area of our RV...love it! Draws up an enormous amt. of water. Quiet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This de-humidifier was removing decent quantities of water until it just stopped working this week. I had it for three months, and the return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Reject
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a refund. Poorly designed and awful quality control. Select another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Parsons

customer_reviews.title: keeps the camper from smelling stuffy works great it stays on 24-7 and removes an amazing amount ...
customer_reviews.text: keeps the camper from smelling stuffy works great it stays on 24-7 and removes an amazing amount of moisture from the camper I was impressed and I do not impress easy
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bousquet

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work ok. Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Only have had for 3 days, bought for rv when not in use. Works great, so far
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for a small room
customer_reviews.text: great for a small room. fairly quiet, good white noise if you're into that, im glad for the auto shut off!
customer_reviews.author: jeepgirlod

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job but it’s a bit loud and I can’t get the reservoir to fully empty. So far no mold, and it’s running still after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Reads a Lot

customer_reviews.title: Releability
customer_reviews.text: Had one running in my 36' sailboat for three years when boat not in use during the week. Would run for days at a time for 24 hours per day. Finally stopped working so bought a new one which started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Dehumidifier Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier works great! It's lightweight and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: dac

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much with easy plug in
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much with easy plug in. I do not like the drain hole positioned in the center. More difficult to empty completely.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J Gault

customer_reviews.title: Working Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive machine, so we don't expect miracles, but it continues to pull moisture out of the air, making the house more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buss

customer_reviews.title: Nice dehumidfier.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job - would buy again. Could be a little quieter but all in all, I am satisfied. The room it is in is a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave French

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had to use a dehumidifier before but from what I can tell this works great as we are using in our travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.... it didn't take the moisture ...
customer_reviews.text: Worthless....it didn't take the moisture out of the room and leaked. I basically threw my $$$$ away with this item.
customer_reviews.author: rpvduffy

customer_reviews.title: I like the small size
customer_reviews.text: I like the small size,easy to operate and drain.Humidity you have to judge yourself,depends on were you live.It beats the Damp rid Bags in Georgia.
customer_reviews.author: GWP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Runs very hot and I have another half the size that works much better. Takes over 2 weeks for reservoir to fill. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ivation GDM30 Powerful Mid-Size Thermo-Electric Dehumidifier Does An Excellent Job
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Ivation Dehumidifier and it is Sooo quiet. It's amazing how much moisture it pulls out of the air. Excellent Product! Worth Every penny. Sorry I couldn't get the pic to copy over
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We use these where I work so got one for home as the humidity was swelling my bedroom door making it stick. Now my door opens and you will be amazed at how much water it pulls from the air. Operates quietly too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coltrain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up fell apart after a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bissett

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Collects a lot of moisture from the air. Planning to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: catysmom

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 days it had the humidity down which is great for the bath bombs I make
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier is really doing the he job in about 2 days it had the humidity down which is great for the bath bombs I make. Love this little dehumidifier
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: This model is not of the same quality as one I purchased three years ago. Will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Great for a boat or RV
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Higher capacity with space saving is what we needed and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer SS

customer_reviews.title: happy with this
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice unit-quiet -portable efficient-easy to move from room to room--we have used several floor models and they tend to be noisy-this one is not.
customer_reviews.author: T. Engle

customer_reviews.title: This has been running in my bathroom nearly nonstop for like 2 months- it's quiet and effective- not as effective ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a basement apartment that's prone to dampness. This has been running in my bathroom nearly nonstop for like 2 months- it's quiet and effective- not as effective as a large, louder one- but considering I'm just trying to avoid a dank smelling bathroom- this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Vishnevsky

customer_reviews.title: Runs nice and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: It sure is pulling water out of the air but I haven't seen my humidity meter move much.
customer_reviews.author: Vmeister

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, it does dehumidify but barely
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, it does dehumidify but barely. Noisy so you have to turn off at night. We stuck it in a two foot square corner and that is all it can handle.
customer_reviews.author: Mac McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Right size to be able to move it around. Takes up the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: jay-bird

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works adequately but if you have a large space needs more power
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Product is very quiet. Just got it in and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is very quiet. Just got it in and using it in our RV - its already working in the humid FL weather!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H

customer_reviews.title: No 12V adapter as listed in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Claims in description that it ships with a 12v adapter. It did not. Returning unit because of deceptive description. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product so far. The test will be the humid Florida summer.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse! Runs almost 24/7 and sucks up a lot of moisture in our high humidity Hawaii environment. I ordered a second one already. This one beat out two other brands for efficiency in a medium sized bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: korky110

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I love this product. It is extremely quiet and you forget it is in the room.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that it’s advertised on amazon as 12v adapter included would make you think it’s 12v ready. It’s not, need to purchase an inverter to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis lysiak

customer_reviews.title: And have liked it so much we got another one for a ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought one early this summer. And have liked it so much we got another one for a different room We have a cottage that gets musty sometimes and it makes a big difference
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! it collects about a cup of water every two days! quiet and works great!
customer_reviews.author: cathy46

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my bedroom. Has helped with mold and definitely takes moisture out of the air, as it fills up about every 2-3 days... also not too loud at all,, barely noticeable! And cute, all for the right price!
customer_reviews.author: michelle s.

customer_reviews.title: to my disappointment, it hardly even collect one drop of water
customer_reviews.text: This unit is so called powerful unit for up to 2200 sqft room, however the actual unit is so small I double it is too small for a 60 sqft room, my room is only 150 sqft, and humidity level is as high as 58%, one will assume this unit will collect 22oz of water as they claim to do, to my disappointment, it hardly even collect one drop of water, and the humidity does not change at all. I am returning the unit for refund, it is not even worth a cent for a junky like this!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Would nice to just have a hose connection on bottom for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the small area in my camper. Would nice to just have a hose connection on bottom for constant use. Great product
customer_reviews.author: john LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my 25' camper. It really draws the moisture out of the interior. I have no complaints. Easy to use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J. Felty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! Works just like they say. Have a big bedroom. Have 2!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momzilla11Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long enough to really review but it seems to do the job
customer_reviews.author: Charleen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to operate and quiet
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to operate and quiet, but it dryer doesn't dry as much moisture out of the air as I'd hoped. It takes about a week to fill the container in a 28-foot travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: TCHarm

customer_reviews.title: I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.text: After hours and house of running it, It only had about 1/4 cup of water (at most) in the chamber. This dehumidifier does not work at all well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect RV size.
customer_reviews.text: Small counter top design, quiet and efficient. It makes a big difference with humidity in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Long

customer_reviews.title: Makes my house more pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 4 of these little jewels in the past 2 months since moving into a 1960s townhome in an old neighborhood. The home felt damp and had a musty smell, so these do a fabulous job in the bathrooms and also in the laundry room. I am happy that the musty smell in my townhome is slowly dissipating, thanks to the de-humidifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not suck in much water. It's not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Farahnaz

customer_reviews.title: Small and Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Small, quiet, and does a good job at sucking moisture out. I use it in my basement office, and it helps keep the moisture level down.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Kallaur

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, both were defective. and stopped working within 1 month of purchase
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Small room
customer_reviews.text: Definitely takes moisture out of the air..good unit for a small room....vry quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad canter

customer_reviews.title: LASTED ONLY 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it's doing a good job of collecting the moisture in this average size bedroom. Would have given it 5 stars but it's a bit noisy. I wouldn't personally be able to sleep through it but my child can. UPDATED REVIEW: I've been using it since end of February and it totally died today. Can't recommend this product. It should have lasted more than 6 weeks. Will hope to get a refund from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is performs beyond expectation. Removing humidity from bathroom area.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This little gem works beautifully! It's quiet, and extracts moisture great!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Forshee

customer_reviews.title: The Ivation GDM30 Stopped Working After 10 Months
customer_reviews.text: The Ivation GDM30 worked great for 10 months then all of a sudden it stopped working. The dehumidifier shows a green light and appears to be running but it isn't collecting any water. It was a great product at first and rated a five star rating but my opinion has changed because of its short operating life. I previously purchased the Ivation GDM20 and it functioned fine until it stopped working. I will soon be purchasing another dehumidifier but it won't be one of the Ivation models.
customer_reviews.author: Ross1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the bigger size- runs quietly and works very efficiently in my daughter's apartment.

product_meta.title: Ivation GDM30 Powerful Mid-Size Thermo-Electric Dehumidifier - Quietly Gathers Up to 20oz. of Water per Day - for Spaces Up to 2,200 Cubic Feet
product_meta.description:
Advanced Peltier technology 
This is a highly effective mid-size machine, built around the powerful and quiet (a lot quieter than standard dehumidifiers) Peltier technology. Because Peltier technology works with almost no moving parts, we managed to design and develop our dehumidifier as a compact appliance: small, lightweight, low on energy consumption, powerful, effective at drying up musty rooms, and, with all that, a long lifespan. 

Removable Water Reservoir 
Rated at being suited for spaces up to 2,200 cubic feet, our mid-size dehumidifier is the perfect tool to extract moisture stagnant areas and mildew- and mold-stricken rooms. From bathrooms to laundry rooms to bedrooms to antique cars to boats, it rids the air of mustiness and unpleasant odors while quietly pulling in excess humidity at a rate of up to 20 ounces per day at 86° Fahrenheit and 80% relative humidity. 

Suited for spaces up to 2,200 cubic feet 
The Ivation mid-size dehumidifier is fitted with a removable water reservoir with a capacity of 53 ounces. This spares you the hustle of emptying out an overflowing water tank every day, as it can hold approximately 3-days’ worth of dehumidifying action. Our dehumidifier is also programmed to shut off automatically once it has reached capacity. An indicator light will go on to remind you to empty the tank out. 

Specifications 
Power consumption peaks at 70w, making this an efficient, reliable, low power, simple to use and effective unit. 
Lightweight, low power, simple to use, safe and effective 
Dehumidifier rate: 16oz/24h at 86F, 80% RH 
53 ounce water tank 
Automatic switch off when the water tank is full (with LED indicator) 
Compressor free, no chemicals, no moving parts; an environmental friendly product 
Weight: 4.8 lbs
feature_bullets: Thermo-electric Peltier module Technology: Medium in Size, Big on Power with No Moving Parts. Reduces humidity in Closet, Basement, Crawl Space, RV, Boat, Car, Home, Bathroom, Bedroom , Small Areas and Tiny Spaces
Collection capacity: approximately 16 fl. oz. per day at 86°F (30°C) 80%RH. Water reservoir capacity: approximately 50 fl. oz. (1.5L)
Very Quiet Operation Due to No Moving Parts ( a lot quieter than standard dehumidifiers)
Compact and lightweight, making it easy to transfer from room to room as needed Innovation with purpose Distributed. At Capacity, Indicator Lights Up and Device Shuts Off
Dimensions: 8.6” x 6.3” x 11.8” (220 x 160 x 300 mm) Weight: 4.4 lbs. (2kg)
